程序包 jse.parallel

类 MPI

java.lang.Object
jse.parallel.MPI
public class MPI extends Object
基于 jni 实现的 MPI wrapper, 介绍部分基于 Microsoft MPI 的标准； 所有函数名称按照原始的 MPI 标准而不是流行的 java binding 中使用的标准， 从而保证对 c 风格的 MPI 有更好的一致性； 在此基础上提供一套完全按照 java 风格的接口来方便使用（而不是原本的不伦不类的风格）。

为了保证接口简洁，这里不再返回错误码，并且暂时不进行错误抛出； 为了避免错误并且加速上线，这里不实现我还没理解的功能

使用方法： 

 
 import static jse.parallel.MPI.Native.*

 MPI_Init(args)
 int me = MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD)
 println('Hi from <'+me+'>')
 MPI_Finalize()

或者更加 java 风格的使用： 

 
 import jse.parallel.MPI

 MPI.init(args)
 int me = MPI.Comm.WORLD.rank()
 println('Hi from <'+me+'>')
 MPI.shutdown() // `finalize()` has been used in java

References: Open MPI Java bindings , MPJ Express Project , MPI: A Message-Passing Interface Standard Version 3.1

作者:
liqa

    • libraryVersion

      public static String libraryVersion() throws MPIException
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • init

      public static void init(String[] aArgs) throws MPIException
      Initializes the calling MPI process’s execution environment for single threaded execution.
      参数:
      aArgs - the argument list for the program
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • init

      public static void init() throws MPIException
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • initialized

      public static boolean initialized() throws MPIException
      Indicates whether init(java.lang.String[]) has been called.
      返回:
      true if init(java.lang.String[]) or initThread(java.lang.String[], int) has been called and false otherwise.
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • shutdown

      public static void shutdown() throws MPIException
      Terminates the calling MPI process’s execution environment.
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • isShutdown

      public static boolean isShutdown() throws MPIException
      Indicates whether shutdown() has been called.
      返回:
      true if MPI_Finalize has been called and false otherwise.
      抛出:
      MPIException

    • initThread

      public static int initThread(String[] aArgs, int aRequired) throws MPIException
      Initializes the calling MPI process’s execution environment for threaded execution.
      参数:
      aArgs - The argument list for the program
      aRequired - The level of desired thread support. Multiple MPI processes in the same job may use different values.
      返回:
      The level of provided thread support.
      抛出:
      MPIException
      另请参阅:
      • MPI_Init_thread function

    • initThread

      public static int initThread(int aRequired) throws MPIException
      抛出:
      MPIException
